items.sentence: Tom said he saw Mary in the park just after 2:30.
Tom said he wanted to ask me a personal question.
Do you think Tom is the one who broke the window?
When did you find out that Tom couldn\'t do that?
You don\'t like living with your parents, do you?
Tom is going to be very happy he didn\'t do that.
Can you give me directions to the subway station?
I want Tom to go to Australia to visit his uncle.
The company spends a lot of money on advertising.
The incident made everyone feel more embarrassed.
